issue.subject: Internet explorer 11 can't select a WFS perimeter in SHOP
issue.description: Internet explorer 11 can't select a WFS perimeter in SHOP

journals.notes:
Two solutions:

* Patch OpenLayers 2.13.1 (there's a patch for 2.14 that never came out) :
** https://github.com/heron-mc/heron-mc/issues/378
** https://github.com/openlayers/openlayers/commit/821975c1f500e26c6663584356db5d65b57f70d9
* Patch easySDI and keep OpenLayers untouched : 
** http://osgeo-org.1560.x6.nabble.com/WFS-and-IE-11-td5090636.html
heron-mc has an interesting way of doing it: https://github.com/heron-mc/heron-mc/blob/master/heron/lib/override-openlayers.js#L1000
rev 9215 Using GPL v3 hero-mc code (source and license included)
